item.title: Web Apps Blue Green Deployments using Azure Front Door and Azure DevOps
item.description: What is Azure Front door? Azure Front Door is a new Application Delivery Network as a service that provides organisations access to Microsoftâ€™s Global network infrastructure. It provides web applications capabilities with SSL offloading, global HTTP load balancing, near instant failover, URL-based routing rules to different backends, Web Application Firewall, DDoS protection and load balancing at the edge. Using Front Door URL-based routing rules to do Blue Green deployments? By placing Azure Front Door as a load balancer in front of your web application, we will examine in this post how to use Front Door in conjunction with Azure DevOps to perform blue green deployments for your Azure Web Application to achieve zero downtime.
